ERROR_INVOICE_AMOUNT: You must choose between { minAmount } and { maxAmount } { currency }
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You do not have enough balance to pay

UNEXPECTED_RECEOVERY_ERROR: An error occurred while logging in
CONFIRM_LOGOUT: Are you sure you want to log out?
ERROR_MADE_BACKUP: You must backup your account before logging out
INVALID_EMAIL: The entered email is not valid
DETECT_NEW_CARD: A new card was detected, are you sure you want to associate it with your account?

ACTIVATE_ERROR: An error occurred while activating the card
RECOMMEND_BACKUP_REASON: So you can log in whenever you need.
RECOMMEND_SAFARI_REASON: for better handling of the application.

COMMENT_MAX_LENGTH: You can write a maximum of { chars } characters
NOT_FOUND_CARD: We have not found cards associated with your account.
